alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 11:55PM MDT until June 22 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Elbert County in east central Colorado... * Until 1245 AM MDT. * At 1153 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Ramah, or 27 miles west of Limon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail on Highway 86 east of Kiowa. SOURCE...Emergency management reported ping pong ball size hail . IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Elbert County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
